thread.title: Shooting of Ram Charan's Mega Meter underway
thread.title_full: Shooting of Ram Charan's Mega Meter underway - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Shooting of Ram Charan's Mega Meter underway
text: Touted to be a peppy number, the shooting of the 'Mega Meter' song from Bruce Lee The Fighter is underway and is also progressing well with a rapid pace. Starring Ram Charan in a lead role, filmmaker Srinu Vaitla is directing the action-romantic entertainer. For the first time ever, actress Rakul Preet Singh will be seen playing lead role in the flick opposite Ram Charan as his off screen lady love. Music director Thaman scored tunes to this commercial entertainer. Already the first look posters, official teaser and the video clip have been released. Another valuable addition of the film is mega star Chiranjeevi, who is all set to play a cameo role in the picture. The director of the film confirmed that the guest appearance of Chiranjeevi will be a big surprise for the fans. The audio of the film is scheduled for a grand launch on October 2. The film is also slated for release on October 16, 2015.
